ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Unicorn Horn
ygData.msgSnippet: I got this thing ages ago by accident. An old druid friend of mine always comes upon rare to semi-rare spawns (damn druids), and he just impules kites them,
ygData.messageBody:
I got this thing ages ago by accident. An old druid friend of mine always
comes upon rare to semi-rare spawns (damn druids), and he just impules kites
them, even if he has no hope of killing them. He kited Broog Bloodbeard for
30 minutes while he called us for help. =P
Anyways, he saw Equestrielle and tried to kite it. He got smacked down prety
hard, and we went over to res him. Before we reached his corpse I caught
Equestrielle on track, and we killed it.

I haven't used the Purge ability, but I'm guessing it probably works like
pillage enchantment. Or maybe it pillages just harmful effects *shrug*,
similar to the Cleanse effect of the Shining Star of Light. Thank you for
posting about this. I never tried any tests with it, and did not know it
slightly enhanced pixie strike. This tells me that the instrument SHOULD be
useful for our expansion song 53 (Song of Twilight). Hopefully, it will
further reduce MR over what a store bought flute could do. We'll see what
happens.

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
50th Bard of Veeshan

>From: "Robert" <merlin26@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Unicorn Horn
>Date: Fri, 21 Apr 2000 12:53:39 -0700
>
>Greetings,
>
>The other day My 45th bard was grouped with a wiz old friend. He said he
>ran
>into some unicorn and killed it a while back and that he got a "unicorn
>horn" but didnt know if it was special or not.
>
>I told him give it to me ill do a quick test ( we were in lower guk so
>didnt
>want to waste To much time).
>
>Well first I fired up Invis with it and it was a wind instrament. So then I
>pixie striked my self 3 times to watch the MR lower.
>
>1. No instrament my mr loweres 8
>2. Normal Wood Flute my mr lowers14 points
>3. Unicorn horn my mr lowers 17 points ( average like 22% increase or
>someting )
>
>I also have a 50th necro and been bored with the game a bit . But my
>question is, well no question. Is there anymore to this horn? I actually
>have never heard of it and those are all the tests I did with it.
>
>I just want to know if anyone else knows anymore about this horn. Possible
>other uses for it and also what Purge spell is ( it has 5 charges)
>
>Also this has no hand graphic on me wood elf bard. It does do the Piper
>Animation though :)
>
>
>Thanks ahead of time.
>
>Tuldar Missednote 45th Wood Elf Bard. Tarew Marr
>Nuldar Andhaka 50th Necromancer Human . Tarew Marr
>
